website_summaries.verdict: A classic crunchy cat treat that is available in lots of yummy flavors, it comes in a large tub for extra savings.
pros: Tasty liver, chicken, and beef flavors
Huge 16-ounce tub is an excellent value
Crunchy outside, with a softer inside that cats crave
cons: Chicken by-product meal, ground corn, and animal fat are the first three ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Feelings!
customer_reviews.text: So I have mixed feelings about this treat. On one hand I’d rate it 5 stars because my cat absolutely loves them. It’s like crack for “cats”. She liked them so much she’d beg for them and even stopped eating her regular food. On the other hand, I rate them “1” only because I believe the treats are causing my cat to itch and lick herself bald. She didn’t display these symptoms until she started eating the treats. Currently, she’s been off the treats for 2 weeks while I wait to see if her hair grows back and the itching stops. I’ll follow up with another update in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: BetRMe

customer_reviews.title: My cat is now a treat addict
customer_reviews.text: my cat is now a treat addict because of this treat, he is literally now selling his possessions to me in order to get more cat treats. This will eventually lead to street cat treats, I suggest you not give your cat a hand full of these treats, he will get addict to it very fast
customer_reviews.author: Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Beware previously-opened containers!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 flavors. 2 were fine, with intact internal seals. 1 was previously opened, seal completely missing, and appeared to be about 3/8 to 1/2 lower than the other two by level, so it was clear it was sold, opened, partially used, then returned. And, the vendor did not check for this and discard, but sold it to another customer, me. I have returned this for a replacement, as the product is fine, it's the behavior of this vendor I think is unethical. So, I suggest you look for missing seals, and complain to Amazon customer support if you find them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: The Neighbor's cat loves this, comes back often.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I feed the neighborhood cat that always comes by meowing and sitting patiently in front of my door to get his morning or late afternoon snack before he moves on to the next neighbors door for food. Cats loves these, all the different flavor ones. I tried giving the cat dry mix, and he only looks back up at me and meow, "what's this? Really?" until I give him the temptations and mix it together.
customer_reviews.author: Reversemidasman

customer_reviews.title: My cat goes crazy for them
customer_reviews.text: I only have to gently shake the tub of treats for my cat to come running, meowing like crazy and begging as if nothing else mattered in the whole world. See photo attached of him trying to get to the very last treats before I order a new batch.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas F

customer_reviews.title: The End All
customer_reviews.text: My four cats live for these treats. They favorite flavors are the chicken and catnip, but the Backyard Cookout mix is nothing they'd turn their nose up at. They beg for them several times a day, and I give a few out here and there, but wish they were a bit healthier since my cats want them so much. But if they were healthier, perhaps they wouldn't be so popular (think healthy ice cream). Anyway, in my experience you cannot go wrong getting Temptations Mixups Cat Treats for you felines. They'll love you for it. ~ Kort
customer_reviews.author: Kort

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick
customer_reviews.text: I have used other temptation treats for my cats training and she loved them. So I decided to buy these... after three sessions we won’t be using anymore as my cat has started vomiting each time she eats these. Much to the delight of the dog, it’s only treats in her throw up as she is prone to hairballs. I’m super upset but warning to all people purchasing watch your kitty when you feed them these they don’t seem to sit well.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Elizabeth Clark

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these
customer_reviews.text: My cats just love these...they will do just about anything for "treats"! My boy knows what I'm saying even when I don't use an excited inflection in my voice...he is a treat hog! I've tried various brands and flavors of treats, and these seem to be the ones that both my cats like the best. The jar is a great size and I'm still working on this first one. I love the screwtop and thick plastic; nice and secure and safe from the cats accidentally getting into the treats. Definitely a deal and the cats love them!
customer_reviews.author: C. Grice

customer_reviews.title: A LOT of treats
customer_reviews.text: No two ways about it - this is a giant jar of Temptations treats. My cats still love them, and they have knocked the jug off of the bedside table and the counter and it has not broken (even though it is made out of a thin plastic). Seriously, this is almost twice as big as the next biggest Temptations container, and it's about the size of a football. That's great when it's full, but it seems like a waste of space when it's nearing empty. The screw-off lid is very nice for easy opening and easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Amighty

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is pure kitty crack. I shake the container and my cats coming running for their treats. If they could have it their way they would only eat these treats.
customer_reviews.author: LEJTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loses Its Mind When I Open This Container!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I don't know what is in these "treats", but if I ever need to reward my cat for good behavior (Hmm, that has never happened) or get my cat's attention and need her to follow me, I simply "shake" the "Temptations" container and she immediately stops whatever she is doing and I am her Master. This product casts a spell on my cat - and if you have a cat that deserves a "treat" or if you have a disobedient cat and you need something to lure them into a particular area (maybe the laundry room?) so you can have a minute's peace (like when you are preparing your lunch?) get this "Economy" size and keep it handy.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. Watterson

customer_reviews.title: Cats enjoy these treats!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, one super fat inactive cat and one fiesty dog cat. Both cats enjoy these treats. I have bought several types of treats but they seem to enjoy this brand the most. Fat cat likes it well because she like most anything she can eat fiesty cat stalks me when I walk by the treats and does his scratchy post thing to get me to give him treats. The size of this container is awesome and it lasts for a while. There are several flavors of this brand and all seem to be liked by the cats. I believe fat cat and fiesty cat would recommend these treats.
customer_reviews.author: GwendolynH

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: We have 6 cats, some with unique tastes in food and treats. We regularly try different treats and flavors to mix-and-match according to each cat's preference. We bought these for the same purpose, and tested them out on all 6 cats at once. They absolutely DESTROYED these treats in record time!!! This is our new staple, go-to treat for all 6 cats. We literally have to be in the area to keep them from pushing in on one another's treats, because it's every kitty for him/herself when these come out of the pantry. Great value for an amazing treat!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: My cats go crazy for Temptations!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far and away my two cats' favorite cat treat. They love the taste and devour them . This is a good size to get if you have multiple cats. All I have to do is shake the container and they come running, meowing all the way! I've tried several different flavors of the Temptations and they love them all. I've also used this for classical conditioning training and operant conditioning training and it produces miracles. The cats never tire of the treats during training sessions and I've achieved great behaviors out of them in the process. Highly recommend this product! :)
customer_reviews.author: Eric G. Samuelson

customer_reviews.title: Kitty crack
customer_reviews.text: I swear this stuff is kitty crack! I keep the container on top of the fridge, and my cat jumps up on the counter every time we go into the kitchen and meows for us to give him some. He would eat these over anything else, if given the option. This large container was a great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: DV-CPA

customer_reviews.title: Almost Instantly Expired
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large container & I stupidly assumed it would have a shelf life of a year considering the size. Two months after purchasing, I realized it expires this month. Even if I had 20 cats there is no way they could eat this many treats before expiration. What a rip off. If only I'd checked the expiration when I got it.....
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: my cat loves these little things.
customer_reviews.text: I have dental treats and these next to my chair he will eat the dental treats sometimes but leaves a bunch uneaten. These though he gobbles down like it's a drug or something. He even jumps on my computer table to let me know he wants them and he'll eat two or three at a time. It's like pace yourself cat. I got these for half price during black friday sales so look out for the fifty percent off deals and stock up then. I bought eight of this size treats for him but he goe's through on of these in about a month and a half. LOL :)
customer_reviews.author: Call me KID

customer_reviews.title: Treats
customer_reviews.text: these are great for treats. But if you are not looking the cat will turn up his nose at other foods that are better for him. My cat will not eat any thing else now. Cant get him to eat regular food which will be good for him. I keep trying to get him to eat what is good for him and it's really hard. Have given away a lot of bags of good foods. I'm lucky as other family,s get the food.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: These are addicting
customer_reviews.text: They prefer the cheese party ones or cat nip flavor but my tabby is a serious addict. He yells all the time for me to get the treats. Although I do make him run after them and he’s great at being a goaltender. I work from home so I’m here quite often. My senior cat is also beginning to yell and if it’s not soft food or treats then she doesn’t want it. These cats are crazy. Buy at your own risk!
customer_reviews.author: C. P.

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these
customer_reviews.text: While I can't personally speak for the flavor, I think Temptations are a great value for cat treats and stay fresh for a long time. My cats love them, even my shy one will come beg for them while I'm watching tv. The big jug is kind of expensive when you look at the price, but it lasts for many weeks so the initial cash outlay might be high but the value and amount of use is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: I've Created a Monster!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these and DEMANDS them several times a day by walking to where I store them and sitting there staring at me until he gets some or walking from me to that spot over and over until he gets some. Now my new puppy is on to the treat spot and is copying the cat. She wants her treats too (not the cat ones though). LOL
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Cat's love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats gave two paws up-- or their max review of these treats. They want it as their regular diet. I can't keep enough of it in stock for them. Price-wise, it is a hardship at $15. Wish it came in a 7 lb bag like other cat foods. I mix this with their regular diet during Vet visits so to ease stress. Covid-19 related stay at home has resulted in more usage.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Our Cat's Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Temptations are the only treats our fur baby will eat. She absolutely loves these. I love the option of being able to purchase the large size, as we go through these pretty quickly. I thought these were a fantastic deal since I pay almost $8 for the original size containers. I typically purchase these at Sams Club when they are on sale, but thought this offer was great until I noticed the Amazon Prime Day deal of under $8 for this 30oz. Wow! Unfortunately I missed the deal!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Rae

customer_reviews.title: Want a happy cat for life?
customer_reviews.text: This is a repeat purchase. These will do the trick. I have a wild neighborhood cat that would eat my dog's food. That is until I started using these to "tame" him. He will let me pet him while he is eating these treats. The flavored "Temptations" are too strong to resist. We are slowly working on him allowing me to pick him up.
customer_reviews.author: S. T. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cat servants be advised.. cats will love these
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these.. all I have to do is shake the container and he comes running. Every morning it’s part of our routine to wake up and go to the living room to give him some of these treats and I’ll tell ya, he hollers at me the entire time until I, as his servant, give himbs his treats. Will be ordering over and over and over to please himbs royal highness.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Newell

customer_reviews.title: Not too good
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty expensive, I was better off getting them from pet smart for less. They probably would’ve also been more fresh from pet smart. These were way thinner than the original ones you buy from pet smart and seemed stale like when I touched it. I think if you’re willing to spend 15+ on it on amazon for whatever reason, sure go for it. But I’ll probably never order these again. Quality over quantity
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: All 13 cats love them
customer_reviews.text: My cats begin a symphony of excitement when I reach for these snacks -it's deafening. In a house of 13 rescues, not everyone likes each other but when it's snack time, they are the best of buddies. I always have to look for value as we got through one of these a week. I got a good deal where buy 4, one was free. Keep that deal on, and I'll be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Wire Inspirations

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: The only Temptations my 4 picky eaters will even touch, lol! Never had a problem with it always being fresh, well packaged and being a good value. Esp considering what it costs for a little bag at the pet store! UPDATE AUG 12: this batch seems to have lots and lots of little crumbs and pieces that aren't cut, which 2 of my 4 refuse to eat.
customer_reviews.author: R. F. Knapke

customer_reviews.title: My two cats love this Sh**!
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love this Sh**! As soon as I shake the container they come running in from different rooms and start meowing. It's pretty funny. Great price for the amount of treats in the container. This is my 6th time ordering this product off Amazon and will continue doing so! My two cats love this Sh**!
customer_reviews.author: Matt and The One Eyed🐈

customer_reviews.title: The Commercials Are NO Exaggeration!
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase the 16 oz. container of this product until I observed just how MUCH my furbaby loves this particular flavor. Now, I stay stocked up and give her these treats when she asks for them! They provide just enough crunch to ensure her teeth stay nice and strong while satisfying her tastebuds.
customer_reviews.author: A.R. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: FACE THE FACTS OF KITTY LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Kitties seem to really love these treats better than anything!! I bought some for the stray cats at my storage unit and they go nuts over them that they come running out when I drive up now. They recognize my car. Well it’s probably easier for them because I designed and made a kitty face on my 2018 Toyota shortly after I bought it LOL. LOVE KITTIES!!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Romer

customer_reviews.title: That cat has gotten violent if Temptations treats are not dispensed at will.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what they put in these things, but the cat has managed to open the lid and gorge herself on them. She will knock all the stuff off the counters until treats are dispensed, and she's taken to following my husband in the bathroom and biting his knees if he doesn't convey treats before using the facilities. 5 stars, I couldn't train the cat to attack my husband, but these treats did.
customer_reviews.author: Wildeflowers

customer_reviews.title: YUM YUMS
customer_reviews.text: My feral cats love these. I go into back yard and yell Yum-Yums and they come running. one time I tried little friskies brand (cheaper) and they turned their noses up and walked away. Can you believe it? I had to go back to the temptations cat treats. It is pricey but my kitties like it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: my furry babies love these treats happy cats happy me. But be careful, questionable ingredients..
customer_reviews.text: Apparently my 3 Cats love the FLAVOR, TASTE AND FRESHNESS, BECAUSE THEY CRY FOR THEM WHEN I GET THE "TREAT" JAR DOWN AND WAIT FOR THEIR SHARE ! AND WAG THEIR TAILS . SO, happy cat, happy me .💕💕😘 problem : there is nothing good in them ! Just "BY PRODUCTS, AND "STUFF"/! CAN'T BE GOOD FOR MY CATS 😥
customer_reviews.author: ANTOINETTE

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for $15.14, which is slightly lower than the cost at Petsmart, Target, and Walmart. My cat loves it because it is Beef and crunchy. Good for if your cat is tired of eating chicken, poultry, fish, or seafood flavored catfood. The container is air tight and keeps the food fresh. Good for cats who are finicky about eating stale catfood.
customer_reviews.author: sophia y

customer_reviews.title: Cats love Temptations
customer_reviews.text: My cats love a treat every morning. They especially love the Temptations. I use to get the smaller size for them, but would run out in a hurry. Now I get the larger size and it last a month or more. I subscribe to the larger size to get it regularly for my fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Kitty's favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I feel weird rating them for taste, since I didn't actually eat any. But, kitty loves them, and Doggie does too if he can shoo the cat away before she finishes. So, I assume they taste GREAT! Vendor delivered in a timely fashion and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M Ralph

customer_reviews.title: All my cats love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have one cat, in particular, that was semi-feral when I adopted her and these treats are the only thing that I can use to bribe her to interact. Even wet cat food doesn't do it. Makes me wish that they made a people-version of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: eyerah

customer_reviews.title: Must be tasty to cats  😋 .. My cat is crazy 😜 for them !!
customer_reviews.text: Of course I don’t eat these , but my cat is CRAZY 😝 for them .. She’s a bit of a picky eater , but will eat her cat food because she knows if she does she gets her Temptations Treats .. She meows real loudly till she gets them and is SO loving 🥰 afterwards ...
customer_reviews.author: Tammie P.

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Approve!
customer_reviews.text: This is my cats' favorite treat. Great value - size and price. I have seven cats and you should hear them come running when I open the treat canister in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela I. Bright

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these treats (too much)
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my two 10-month-old cats will either eat wet food or these treats and rarely bother with the kitty chow they are supposed to be eating. So this has become an expensive replacement for their dry food, but such is life when it comes to cats.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: My cats are CRAZY for these treats!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this flavor. I've tried a few of the other flavors and they seem to like this one more. I'm not what's in these things but as soon as they hear that container, they swoop in from wherever they are sleeping to get a handful. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Temptations Still Going Strong...
customer_reviews.text: Temptations has made another flavor that my cat Loves. Birdy goes after these treats as if she had been starved. Not a trace of the treats to be found. She looks forward to getting her treat after breakfast and after dinner, She waits patiently for us to finish our dinner as soon as she sees me move and I get the plates in the sink to wash. It begins she begs by sitting on her butt with her paws in the air. ...She is Consistent but patient . It is a Great Value for the money. Temptations Does it again!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Baber

customer_reviews.title: The cats meow!
customer_reviews.text: My cats are indoor outdoor cats and when I shake this jar they come running to come in for the night. They each get a small handful and gobble it up. They seem to like the taste. I have ordered this product many times and I’ve never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice container, good value
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love these treats. They're getting used to the noise of the unscrewed top, so they come running when they hear it. The cap is nice, as it seals the container well - if it didn't, they would be sniffing around it constantly and knocking it off the counter. Thankfully that hasn't happened!
customer_reviews.author: A. Purohit

customer_reviews.title: My cat's addiction!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat's addiction!! My cat just loves these treats! All I have to do is shake the container and she come running! So if you want to spoil your cat to the point of no return this is the treat that will do it! There is the reason they named it Temptations!!!
customer_reviews.author: Check This Out

customer_reviews.title: Currency for Cats
customer_reviews.text: My two cat's love Temptations. They love them so much I've started some unspoken agreement with them, that if they come inside (after I've let them outside) they'll get a handful of treats. They love these so much that if I even TRY to bring them inside without these, they will patiently wait at the door until I fetch them. Thanks, Temptations- I'm a slave to the treat economy.
customer_reviews.author: Minno Durkin

customer_reviews.title: The cats think these are wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: It is their view of the flavor I marked as 5 stars. They seem to like the mixture of soft and hard treats. My problem: the company has now increased the daily dose from one or two to 12. My cats would happily consume 12 at least four times a day!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price and my cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome value for the quantity of treats! My cat absolutely loves this flavor mix and I have set it to auto ship! That’s totally convenient from having to run to the store for pet supplies. I will definitely continue to purchase this item for my cat. It’s definitely a way better deal that buying at a pet or department store.
customer_reviews.author: Jnews00j1

customer_reviews.title: I have to be careful how much I give my cat
customer_reviews.text: He is getting a bit of a belly, but he sits up and begs for them. He will actually stay on his hind legs balancing while I feed them one at a time to him by hand. He will hold my fingers in his for paws and let me feed him. I realize not all cats will do this. But many of my cats have liked various flavors of these over the years. I don't usually get them from Amazon but it is handy if I forget when I am doing the bulk of my cat shopping. They arrived ok and seemed fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Spot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this stuff, so I decided 2 try buying the 30oz 1 compared to the 16oz 1 I usually buy, cause my cats go through these like water. They like it more then thr own food. I believe this will hold me a lot longer than the smaller one which I really needed.
customer_reviews.author: Selina Bronstein

customer_reviews.title: My cats like it, and that's what's important
customer_reviews.text: My cats are generally finicky, but they seem to like this stuff OK. A bit more expensive than other brands. Because it comes in small containers it doesn't get rancid before you can use it, unlike the stuff that comes in large bags.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: The best treat for my cat!!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves these treats, temptations are the only treats I buy these days! Happy (my cat) loves playing the throw the treat down the stairs to the lower level. He runs after it like a bat out of hell, and begs to do it again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maremare13

customer_reviews.title: Cats LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats LOVE these. They like them almost as much as the chicken flavor. They will leave their favorite wet chicken food to grab these. Our cats were feral before rescue and we credit these for helping with their trust issues and they totally started coming to us because of their love of these treats! Apparently they are delicious!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Our cats like these treats
customer_reviews.text: With pets, you pay your money, you take your chances. Some pets will really enjoy a product and others will be completely indifferent. Our pets enjoy these treats. I mean they really like them. So we lucked out. Hopefully you will too.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGuest

customer_reviews.title: Kat treats
customer_reviews.text: I think the kats love them. I mix flavors, I buy one flavor one time and different flavor next. But this one has lots of different stuff. PS. You never really know what kats (cats) are really thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Webster

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: I give my cats these treats every night around 7:30, they love them. I usually toss them across the floor and hide them around the house to make a game for them. Not sure if they are very nutritious, but the cats love them.
customer_reviews.author: mbsf

customer_reviews.title: Cats are addicted....
customer_reviews.text: Wish I enjoyed this as much as my cats. I feed them treats once in the morning and again once at night; they are absolutely addicted to this stuff! I had to back off as they would eat this all day long if I let them. I tried it myself but could only choke it down with a little milk in the bowl...
customer_reviews.author: zzjohn

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: I swear these are like drugs to my cat. She loves them and I think would eat the whole container full at once if we let her. Cats might not talk, but they can definitely communicate. Our cat begs for these.
customer_reviews.author: Pappa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Drives all the cats wild.
customer_reviews.text: My cats go nuts for these things. Great price in here, have them on subscription so the little brats never run out. This is the only container that's dog proof as well as our German Shepherd loves these and tries to get to them constantly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rafe

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Delight
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats enjoy these very much. They come running when I shake the container. Other variation of the product, such as Mix-Ups, as well as two other flavors have cause the cats to vomit. These ones do not for our spoiled cats.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: The perfect chaser for a pill pocket.
customer_reviews.text: Want your feline family member to eat their pill pocket with meds in it. Lead with Temptations before and after. Works every time with even the most finicky feline. The rest of the crew all line up knowing they will get one when the pill vial opens for "Pill" the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo 47

customer_reviews.title: Always yummy to my cats
customer_reviews.text: These were eaten before they went bad. Four cats, treats fed only in the morning only when I have another cup of coffee. Yup, you read that right! For every cup of coffee I have, they get treats. I try to sneak a cup now and again but always get caught. Nothing wrong with their hearing!
customer_reviews.author: puket3

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dry cat food that my cat will eat. It is a complete food source, not just a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats that are litter mates. Both of them really like these treats. I tried giving them the expensive Blue Buffalo Wilderness Chicken and one of them doesn't like them at all.
customer_reviews.author: JP of Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: loved by all
customer_reviews.text: all three of our cats come begging for this several times a day but since it is just a treat and not regular food, they get it only as treats. But it is definitely loved by them. All of the flavors it comes in except the fish one.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Chaney

customer_reviews.title: The world would end, for my pets, without these treats!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these treats every month for my cat and (I'm a shame to say.) my dog. The dog will only eat this brand and he expects a treat when the cat receives hers. The vet doesn't mind and my dog is healthy and happy. The price and variety options are better via Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Thaddina G Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Love these Kitty Yummies!
customer_reviews.text: Oh yes, our 7 cats scramble to come running when we shake the big tub of Kitty Yummies! This particular one is beef, and they're really enjoying it! It's always best to get a whole pile, especially if you have spoiled fatcats like we do! Great price, fast ship.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cats go bonkers for them
customer_reviews.text: Purchased strictly as a “treat” like “candy” for my cats. I mix this with the good stuff that controls tartar and hairballs. They can hear the opening of the container from miles away. Lol
customer_reviews.author: chiquitanerd

customer_reviews.title: Cats love temptations 😄
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. Bought one for my sisters cats too! Giant container. Love shaking it and seeing my three cats fly into the room in less than a second!! Even my little Pookie princess loves these treats. Normally she'd turn her nose up at anything that grotesques her in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: Addie G. Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love the Temptation Treats!
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love the treats by Temptations. I have most all flavors so they can have different choices. It must taste good as Treats are one of the first things my kitties head for!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte M. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Love the value size!
customer_reviews.text: This is our cat’s favorite variety. He begs for them multiple times per day, every day ... think he might be addicted. Love that we can get them in a size that lasts him a while.
customer_reviews.author: GrayJ1

customer_reviews.title: Feline Bribery Assistant - good stuff
customer_reviews.text: these are for bribing your furry friend into listening. Need to call the cat in for the night? shake the box. Need to get the cat away from your toddler? shake the box Anything you need to do with your cat? shake the DAMN BOX. Seriously - cats go crazy for these things
customer_reviews.author: that guy

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Treats Ever
customer_reviews.text: Lulu loves them. She will come from any part of the garden when she hears the rattle of the container. It's much cheaper to buy these than the little bags in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Arny and Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good price with delivery convenience.
customer_reviews.text: I am guessing on the flavor, I did not try them. But Kitty liked them. Price is competitive with pet store. It was nice to get it delivered during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cats
customer_reviews.text: 2 of my cats eat them, the other won't touch them, (but she doesn't eat much of anything). This is a great value and the screw on lid makes it much more convenient than the little zip lock bags.
customer_reviews.author: Net-Shop`R

customer_reviews.title: Best cat treats
customer_reviews.text: No other cat treat measures up to Temptations. My cats won't even touch any other brands of treats. If this is the kind they want then this is the kind they'll get.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: ALL Seven of my cats go nuts for this treat. They sing when I shake the jar!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only treat all of my cats come running for. I have been known to use this as a distraction when I need to coral them and get them out of my way or apply flea meds!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Girl

customer_reviews.title: Favorite cat treat in my house.
customer_reviews.text: My cats only like this brand of treat. I've tried Greenies, Blue, and Friskies, but the Temptations are the only hit. They have a lot of different flavors and they make my cats happy.
customer_reviews.author: DrewGuy

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this'
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is we shake this and our cats come running from wherever they are. Then they meow until we give them a small handful and they chow down. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Waller

customer_reviews.title: Really EXPENSIVE but our cats LOVE 'em!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cats go completely bonkers over these treats! I don't know what they put in these things but our 4 cats are addicted! Just wish they weren't so darned EXPENSIVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: cooknwoman

customer_reviews.title: CAT LOVES THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: THE CAT REALLY LIKES THE MIXUPS!!!! THERE LITTLE PUFFS OF FILLED FLAVOR!!! SHE RATHER EAT THEM THEN ANY FOOD SHE HAS.....SHE REALLY DIGS THE SURFERS DELIGHT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: douglas r forrestal

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this!
customer_reviews.text: My cats won't go to sleep unless I leave a small bowl of these out for them. I know they are just a treat but I pamper my babies. They love these.
customer_reviews.author: Beldandy

customer_reviews.title: Even Finicky Cats Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: My finicky cat loves these treats! In fact, they are the only cat treats that she will eat. I recommend them highly for all cats...finicky or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: TFD

customer_reviews.title: Cat love's them.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the container, the kitty couldn't get her fat butt there fast enough! Not sure if it was the flavor or freshness, but it passed the taste test!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kollar

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Food
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fussy cat loves this stuff. More variety on line then in stores. Price little high but cat will jump very high for it like in the commercials.
customer_reviews.author: E Chumly Manka

customer_reviews.title: Great salad crouton replacement in a jam... My Mother in Law loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it's Covid- don't judge! I will say though since she ate them- her hair has never been shinier. The only downside is now she coughs out hairballs and plays with a ball of string all day...
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: BEST CAT CRACK EVER !
customer_reviews.text: My cats (all 11 of them) go crazy when they hear the sound of these treats. I have now started to get them delivered every month.
customer_reviews.author: mirgrol

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat loves these.
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky eater cat who refuses most treats. My cat loves these and I can get them here for a few dollars cheaper then Pet smart, especially when they are on sale. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Titi for my babies.
customer_reviews.text: All I know is Juca & Pepeu looooove it. All I have to do is say the word “titi” for treat and they run for it. If my cats love it I’ll give 5 stars 😊
customer_reviews.author: 🌺 Deia 🌺

customer_reviews.title: Training treats
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love these crunchies. I now have to pay the troll toll every time I leave the house. They expect their treats lol perfect for training
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Must have yet Addictive cat treat so beware and using sparingly
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have in our house our cats are obsessed. Do obsessed I have to hide them as one of the cats has figured how to spin the top to open it
customer_reviews.author: KELLEY KINNEY

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love them
customer_reviews.text: My cats are addicted to these. they line up on my bed waiting for their treats. I got tired of buying all the small bags so this is a good amount and lasts a while. Then I use the empty tub for storing craft supplies
customer_reviews.author: Anjella

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My cat will only eat these treats. The larger size works out great for me she has a habit of tearing the packages open. The price is very competitive and I can get it delivered usually in one day. It has several flavors and she likes four.so I order 2 usually.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect treaties for my meow meows
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. Much like the commercials they come running when they hear the container shake. Cant say as to if the flavor is on point as I have not tried them myself but if I was a cat I would be tempted....maybe thats why they call them that
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: My Cat's Favorite Treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat doesn't like soft treats, but he likes these with the crunchy outside and soft center. Good value for the large size, and they don't go stale over time (or at least he doesn't seem to care).
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: TEMPTATIONS MixUps Crunchy and Soft Cat Treats, 30 oz.
customer_reviews.text: Since my three cats love this treat, then they are the picky judges! These treats are a really good and economical deal.
customer_reviews.author: Garlic Man

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these treats. In fact all of the cats in the household love these. Great value for multiple cat households.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Baby girl loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My cat (kitty cat) loves the things. I have to give her a handful every morning at 6:00 . I think she s addicted to them. The price is o.k. she's worth it to me. She says "Meow".
customer_reviews.author: Glenn M.

customer_reviews.title: Always a favorite
customer_reviews.text: There are two flavors my cats will always eat and never grow tired, and this is one of those flavors. The other is the Temptations chicken.
customer_reviews.author: EllenTop Contributor: Coloring

product_meta.title: TEMPTATIONS MixUps Crunchy and Soft Cat Treats, 30 oz.
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chicken, Liver, BeefMix and match your cat’s favorite flavors with this delicious combo of treats. Your little buddy can’t resist the delectable taste of TEMPTATIONS, so give them these purrfect TEMPTATIONS MixUps Cat Treats… they’ll come running the moment you open the pack. Each of these tasty cat treats has less than 2 calories and provides an irresistible combination of both crunchy and soft textures. They also come in a cat-proof, super value-sized tub, so your feline friend can enjoy their favorite snack when you open it… but never when they shouldn’t! These TEMPTATIONS MixUps Cat Treats are a perfect addition to your cat’s normal feeding routine: Use them as a treat, a meal, or a cat food topper. * Based on 2019 Nielsen sales data
feature_bullets: Contains one (1) 30 oz. tub of TEMPTATIONS MixUps Treats for Cats BACKYARD COOKOUT Flavor
Your cat can’t wait to get their paws on this flavorful mix of cat food treats that are crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside
Under 2 calories per cat treat, so you can feel good about rewarding your cat every day
TEMPTATIONS Cat Treats are 100% nutritionally complete and balanced for adult cat maintenance and can be used as a treat, meal, or cat food topper
Treat ’em again and again with this super value-sized, resealable tub: perfect for keeping cat paws off when you’re not watching
America’s #1 Cat Treat Brand*… just shake the pack and they’ll come running
